author: Special Correspondent
text: The Senior Citizens Group of Besant Nagar in association with the Rotary Club of Madras Mount is conducting a free legal aid camp for elders to combat land grabbing. The camp will be held on Friday at Haddows Club in Nungambakkam from 3 p.m. For details and registration:seniorcitizensofbesantnagar @gmail.comor phone 2491 6076.
title: Free legal aid camp
